author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Prima Moda Q1 Net Loss Widens To 486,000 Zlotys
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - PRIMA MODA SA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY THAT ITS Q1 NET LOSS WAS 486,000 ZLOTYS VERSUS LOSS OF 341,000 ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
* Q1 REVENUE WAS 5.9 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS 7.2 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
